body:
Hi!


Typically it is easier / cheaper if you get a ticket online some days in
advance (www.bahn.de). However, you can also get it at the train
station, which is attached to the airport. ICE is the fastest train
class, IC and EC are also fast - if your take a RE or RB it will be some
small banlieu-train, avoid it!

Cheers, Lars.
